Files

mstickerlib/matrix/sticker_formats/
ponies.rs

1//! Ponies([MSC2545](https://github.com/matrix-org/matrix-spec-proposals/pull/2545)) are the new upcomming matrix sticker standard.
2//! They allow room and personal stickerpacks.
3//! This is already supported by many matrix clients like Neko, Cinny, Fluffychat and more.
4//! Keep in mind that ponies specification is not stable yet.
5
6use crate::{
7	error::NoMimeType,
8	matrix::{self, Mxc}
9};
10use indexmap::IndexMap;
11use serde::{Deserialize, Serialize};
12use std::collections::HashSet;
13
14#[derive(Clone, Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
15pub struct PackInfo {
16	pub display_name: String,
17	pub avatar_url: Option<String>
18}
19
20#[derive(Clone, Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
21pub struct StickerPack {
22	pub images: IndexMap<String, Sticker>,
23	pub pack: PackInfo
24}
25
26#[derive(Clone, Copy, Debug, Eq, PartialEq, Hash, Serialize, Deserialize)]
27#[serde(rename_all = "lowercase")]
28pub enum Usage {
29	Sticker,
30	Emoticon
31}
32
33#[derive(Clone, Debug, Eq, PartialEq, Serialize, Deserialize)]
34pub struct MetaData {
35	pub w: u32,
36	pub h: u32,
37	pub size: usize,
38	pub mimetype: String
39}
40impl TryFrom<crate::image::Image> for MetaData {
41	type Error = NoMimeType;
42	fn try_from(value: crate::image::Image) -> Result<Self, Self::Error> {
43		Ok(Self {
44			w: value.width,
45			h: value.height,
46			size: value.data.len(),
47			mimetype: value.mime_type()?
48		})
49	}
50}
51
52#[derive(Clone, Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
53pub struct Sticker {
54	pub body: String,
55	pub info: MetaData,
56	pub url: Mxc,
57	pub usage: HashSet<Usage>
58}
59
60/// **Warning:** `usage` will always be set to [`Sticker`](Usage::Sticker), since
61/// [`Emoticon`](Usage::Emoticon) is only useful when paired with a string.
62impl From<matrix::sticker::Sticker> for Sticker {
63	fn from(value: crate::matrix::sticker::Sticker) -> Self {
64		Self {
65			body: value.body,
66			url: value.image.url,
67			info: value.image.meta_data,
68			usage: [Usage::Sticker].into_iter().collect()
69		}
70	}
71}
72
73impl From<matrix::stickerpack::StickerPack> for StickerPack {
74	fn from(value: crate::matrix::stickerpack::StickerPack) -> Self {
75		Self {
76			images: value
77				.stickers
78				.into_iter()
79				.enumerate()
80				.map(|(i, sticker)| {
81					if let Some(emoticon) = sticker.emoticon.clone() {
82						let mut sticker: Sticker = sticker.into();
83						sticker.usage.insert(Usage::Emoticon);
84						(emoticon, sticker)
85					} else {
86						(format!("{i:04}"), sticker.into())
87					}
88				})
89				.collect(),
90			pack: PackInfo {
91				display_name: value.title,
92				avatar_url: None
93			}
94		}
95	}
96}
97
98impl_from!(Sticker, StickerPack);
